trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The yuan-ti’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Dreamer’s Amulet
text: When in possession of this item, the yuan-ti can also innately cast the following spells:
2/day each: crown of madness, ray of sickness, sleep

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks. Scimitar. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
